item.title: SW - PicPick
item.description:
The Most Powerful Screenshot Tool #

SW in work #

It might be the same in other countries, but in Korea, software usage for businesses is strictly regulated. Still, there are many situations at work where I need simple tools like image or video viewers, or screenshot programs. Finding a tool that balances both licensing policies and functionality can be quite a challenge.

PicPick #

Recently, PicPick added support for the WebP format, making it the program that now has all the features I was looking for.
